item.title: You build it, you run it... but what exactly?
item.description: “You build it, you run it”, easy to say, but, depending on your developer experience and platform capability… not at all easy. What am I expected to “build” and what should I “run”? Let’s take a look. Let’s start with this overview that I show teams I engage with during their onboarding and where their responsibilities begin and what not to worry about (but can still affect them of course).
